mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item ( seller_id, description, price, image_url, created_at ) VALUES ( #{sellerId}, #{description}, #{price}, #{imageUrl}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT i.item_id, i.seller_id, i.description, i.price, i.image_url, i.created_at, u.login_email as seller_email, u.name as seller_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.seller_id = u.id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT i.item_id, i.seller_id, i.description, i.price, i.image_url, i.created_at, u.login_email as seller_email, u.name as seller_name FROM item i LEFT JOIN user u ON i.seller_id = u.id ORDER BY i.item_id DESC
